transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yes sir, Anjali this side from Indiamart and office.
Executive: Yeah yeah actually I am talking with your one of your agent her name is Lakshmi so
Customer: Okay.
Executive: That's why I didn't lift the call. Yeah tell me.
Customer: Okay actually we discussed your concern and like you you called on a number like 99009810 with the name of Digala Ram Lakshmi right?
Executive: Yes.
Customer: With whom you are talking right now.
Executive: Yes yes.
Customer: Okay so do you have any issue regarding services because sir right now your account manager is Sushmita Tiwari and she called you in a morning time but like you were might be you were busy that's why you didn't answer. So like right now she is handling your account so if you have any issue regarding the services or queries you can you can connect with her directly I can share the number.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: And I I will share the number what about the services sir are you getting like what how is the response you are getting right now from the Indiamart services?
Executive: You can send by by WhatsApp or
Customer: I will share on a WhatsApp and I can tell you right now one second.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: One second.
Executive: Okay okay.


Customer: Sir please notice 6389
Executive: One second.
Customer: 63
Executive: 89
Customer: 89
Executive: 18
Customer: 18
Executive: 66
Customer: 66
Customer: 87
Executive: 87
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay. She is your account manager right now and she is handling your account. Her name is Sushmita.
Customer: Yes she is name her name is Sushmita you can call her or you can connect her on a WhatsApp also.
Executive: Sure sure. And yeah and what about the services right now how is the services?
Customer: Yeah absolute good so yeah nothing nothing is there like there is no bad things are there yeah is good going on.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: So team members are collaborating and discussing my taking the taking my concerns and all. They are very friendly like that.
Customer: Okay sir okay. so okay so we received your call so right so everything is okay in the services and you discuss with with us. So we are going to close it and you will receive a feedback through your mail or like Indiamart mobile app you can give the feedback of our services. It will be very helpful for us. And one more thing sir I want to discuss with you you are dealing all over India business or some like in your state?
Executive: No no no all over India I want to do.
Customer: All over India and what will be minimum order quantity or minimum order value?
Executive: About 2000 like it based on the requirement I will be
Customer: Like around for example you are right now your business in Andhra Pradesh but you got a inquiry from Delhi location so what should be the minimum order value to deliver the product to the Delhi location?
Executive: It will be minimum 50000.
Customer: 50000 okay. Yeah.
Customer: Okay sir tomorrow are you available to connect on the video meeting so actually we want to connect on the video meeting and we want to discuss about the further services like other tools which have in the seller panel.
Executive: Sure sure.
Customer: So we can like explain you in detail and about the location filter about the quantity filter GST filter and other other like you can take the feedback or rating reviews from your buyer side which will help you a lot in your account because I am as I am checking like in your location in the same product line there are multiple sellers are registered with us and they have many rating reviews in their catalog like someone has five star someone has 4.5 with like 13 14 or a 20 review rating so definitely it is a online platform so buyer check the rating review of the seller account.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: So we will guide you how can take the feedback from our buyers it will be help you a lot and we will discuss other like tools which are which are added in the seller panel. So can you give us a time for tomorrow to connect on the video meeting?
Executive: Yeah sure sure sure.
Customer: Like around what time?
Executive: Like maybe after 3 o'clock.
Customer: Sure sure sure sir. 3 pm like on the evening. Your account manager will call you and right now I am closing your concern please give us feedback.
Executive: And also can I use the this APK like application at the same time in two devices two or three.
Customer: Yeah yeah you can use it you just need to login with your registered mobile mobile number and you can login.
Executive: Okay that's fine that's fine.
Customer: Okay sir thank you so much.
Executive: Thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know about services.

- Customer asks about using the application on devices.

Resolution:

- Executive shared account manager's contact details.

- Executive confirmed the application can be used on devices.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect on a video meeting tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- services, account manager, video meeting, application
